text:
Hey <@U07FYDHS7FC>,
afaik - there's currently no KB API.
What you can do is:
• create a new HubSpot KB
• select "Import knowledge base" in the dropdown
• Walk through the process and import your current KB into HubSpot
<@UJAPS2K4N>, thank you very much! I truly appreciate it!! :slightly_smiling_face: Will try this out!!
